# AIOS Nexus Documentation

> **Auto-generated codebase documentation**

---

## Overview

This directory contains documentation generated by AIOS Nexus based on analysis of your codebase.

---

## Generated Files

| File                  | Description                         |
| --------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `project-overview.md` | High-level project summary          |
| `architecture.md`     | Architecture patterns and structure |
| `tech-stack.md`       | Technology stack details            |

---

## Updating Documentation

```bash
# Re-analyze and regenerate
aios-nexus scaffold generate

# Update specific documentation
aios-nexus scaffold fill --target=docs --file=architecture
```

---

## Manual Edits

You can manually edit any generated file. AIOS Nexus will preserve manual changes unless you use `--force` to regenerate.

---

_AIOS Nexus Docs v5.0.0_
